languages.text: "Кого-то же должно. Среди жертв репрессий и мой клан, в том числе моя семья. Я не могу молча смотреть как их истязают и потому дерзнул обратиться к вам".
"Someone has to be. My clan and my family are among the persecuted. I couldn't stand and watch them being tortured, so I mustered the nerve to address you with a request."
languages.original_text: "Кого-то же должно. Среди жертв репрессий и мой клан, в том числе моя семья. Я не могу молча смотреть как их истязают и потому дерзнул обратиться к вам".

traits.locale_text: "Someone has to be. My clan and my family are among the persecuted. I couldn't stand and watch them being tortured, so I mustered the nerve to address you with a request."
"Someone has to be. My clan and my family are among the persecuted. I couldn't stand and watch them being tortured, so I mustered the nerve to address you with a request."
"Someone has to be. My clan and my family are among the persecuted. I couldn't stand and watch them being tortured, so I mustered the nerve to address you with a request."

"Someone has to be. My clan and my family are among the persecuted. I couldn't stand and watch them being tortured, so I mustered the nerve to address you with a request."

languages.text: «Alguien tiene que preocuparse. Mi clan y mi familia están entre los perseguidos. No puedo quedarme mirando cómo los torturan, así que reuní el valor de hacerle esta solicitud directa».
languages.original_text: "Someone has to be. My clan and my family are among the persecuted. I couldn't stand and watch them being tortured, so I mustered the nerve to address you with a request."

traits.locale_text: «Alguien tiene que preocuparse. Mi clan y mi familia están entre los perseguidos. No puedo quedarme mirando cómo los torturan, así que reuní el valor de hacerle esta solicitud directa».

languages.text: 「誰かがそうする必要があるからです。私の一族と家族が迫害されています。黙って皆が苦しめられる姿を見ていることができず、勇気を振り絞って声を上げさせていただきました」
languages.original_text: "Someone has to be. My clan and my family are among the persecuted. I couldn't stand and watch them being tortured, so I mustered the nerve to address you with a request."

traits.locale_text: 「誰かがそうする必要があるからです。私の一族と家族が迫害されています。黙って皆が苦しめられる姿を見ていることができず、勇気を振り絞って声を上げさせていただきました」

languages.text: “总得有人站出来说话。我的氏族成员和我的家人都遭到了迫害，我不能就这么眼睁睁地看着他们遭到折磨，所以我才鼓起勇气，向您提出了这个请求。”
languages.original_text: "Someone has to be. My clan and my family are among the persecuted. I couldn't stand and watch them being tortured, so I mustered the nerve to address you with a request."

traits.locale_text: “总得有人站出来说话。我的氏族成员和我的家人都遭到了迫害，我不能就这么眼睁睁地看着他们遭到折磨，所以我才鼓起勇气，向您提出了这个请求。”

languages.text: "Irgendjemand muss es tun. Mein Clan und meine Familie zählen zu den Opfern. Ich konnte nicht untätig zusehen, wie sie gefoltert werden, darum habe ich den Mut gefunden, mit einer Bitte an Euch heranzutreten."
languages.original_text: "Someone has to be. My clan and my family are among the persecuted. I couldn't stand and watch them being tortured, so I mustered the nerve to address you with a request."

traits.locale_text: "Irgendjemand muss es tun. Mein Clan und meine Familie zählen zu den Opfern. Ich konnte nicht untätig zusehen, wie sie gefoltert werden, darum habe ich den Mut gefunden, mit einer Bitte an Euch heranzutreten."

languages.text: « Il faut bien que quelqu'un s'en inquiète. Mon clan et ma famille font partie des persécutés. Je refuse de rester les bras croisés alors qu'ils subissent les pires tortures. Je me devais donc de rassembler le courage de vous adresser cette requête. »
languages.original_text: "Someone has to be. My clan and my family are among the persecuted. I couldn't stand and watch them being tortured, so I mustered the nerve to address you with a request."

traits.locale_text: « Il faut bien que quelqu'un s'en inquiète. Mon clan et ma famille font partie des persécutés. Je refuse de rester les bras croisés alors qu'ils subissent les pires tortures. Je me devais donc de rassembler le courage de vous adresser cette requête. »

languages.text: "Birilerinin endişelenmesi gerek. Klanım ve ailem de eziyet görenlerin arasında. İşkence edilmelerini hiçbir şey yapmadan seyredemem. Ben de sizden talepte bulunmak için cesaretimi topladım."
languages.original_text: "Someone has to be. My clan and my family are among the persecuted. I couldn't stand and watch them being tortured, so I mustered the nerve to address you with a request."
